verbs.description: SINGAPORE • [ARG0: President Trump] [V: predicted] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] [ARG1: that he will know almost immediately when meeting Kim Jong Un whether the North Korean dictator is serious about negotiating a nuclear deal , suggesting]
